RecievedRoyalties(address,address,uint25.details: The marketplace would emit this event from their contracts. Or they would call royaltiesRecieved() function.

params.amount: The amount being paid to the creator
params.buyer: The person buying the NFT on a secondary sale
params.creator: The original creator of the NFT entitled to the royalties

RecievedRoyalties(address,address,uint25.notice: (Mandatory) This event is emitted when royalties are transfered.
